attributes.action: Reduce the charges for customers with NO  Gas  and on Economy Seven  electricity
attributes.additional_details:
Consumers with No gas supply and  who have Night storage Electric Heating  are trapped  and held to ransom by the Economy seven tarriff.

These consumers should all get a rebate of £1000  to compensate them for  the excess amount that they are required  to pay for daylight electric power they consume.
